short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control your YouTube from anywhere in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Control your YouTube
Pause/Resume and more on your YouTube video without visiting the YouTube tab! No need to worry about someone peeking at your Youtube screen at workplace :D

If you, like most people, hesitate to access YouTube while sitting in an office environment, then this little tool is definitely for you. If someone comes to talk to you while you're listening to music on YouTube while working, you can instantly resume or play the music. It also provides the option to play the current video on loop, play the next video, start from the beginning, add to watch later, subscribe to the channel while showing the number of subscribers and number of views on the video. Also, you can like or dislike the video and send it to your library.

Features supported:
Pause current video
Resume current video
Play next video
Play video from beginning
Mute the video
Add to Watch Later
